stories.title: Xcel Will Conclude Edge Class
stories.intended_reader: Travelers interested in upcoming Edge Class ships
stories.core_insight: Xcel will be the final Edge Class ship
stories.markdown:
**Edge Class began with Edge. It will conclude with Xcel.**

[Celebrity Xcel](/ships/celebrity-cruises/celebrity-xcel.html) is planned as the fifth and final Edge Class ship, following Edge, Apex, Beyond, and Ascent. When Xcel arrives, the class will be complete.

The name suggests excellenceâ€”the culmination of everything Edge Class has learned. Four ships of refinement informing the final design. Xcel will represent Edge Class at its most evolved.

The Magic Carpet perfected. The infinite verandas refined. The Eden experience matured. Everything Edge pioneered will reach full expression.

**The promise:** Xcel will deliver Edge Class completed. The ship that benefits from everything the class has learned.

Those who love Edge Class should anticipate Xcel. The conclusion of a revolutionary design.

stories.title: What Xcel Will Perfect
stories.intended_reader: Edge Class enthusiasts following class development
stories.core_insight: Xcel will incorporate five ships of learning
stories.markdown:
**Each Edge Class ship improved on the previous. Xcel will perfect them all.**

[Celebrity Xcel](/ships/celebrity-cruises/celebrity-xcel.html) will benefit from Edge's pioneering, Apex's refinement, Beyond's expansion, and Ascent's maturation. Five ships of lessons informing the final design.

The infinite verandas that have evolved across the class. The suite experiences that have grown more sophisticated. The dining programs that have refined. Everything accumulated into Xcel.

'Why wait for the last ship?' someone might ask.

'Because the last ship learns everything,' the experienced will reply.

**The truth:** Xcel will represent Edge Class at its most complete. The ship that incorporates every lesson.

Those who love Edge Class should anticipate Xcel. The final answer to Edge's questions.

stories.title: Anticipating Excellence
stories.core_insight: Xcel will attract those who want the newest Edge experience
stories.markdown:
**New ships attract passengers who want the latest refinements.**

[Celebrity Xcel](/ships/celebrity-cruises/celebrity-xcel.html) will draw travelers who specifically seek the newest in Edge Class innovation. The latest technology. The most recent design thinking. The freshest expression of what Celebrity can do.

Bookings will open well before launch. Those who prioritize newest over familiar will want to be aboard early. The inaugural season will attract enthusiasts.

**The opportunity:** Xcel will offer the newest Edge Class experience. Plan accordingly for those who value latest and finest.

Watch for Xcel booking announcements. The final Edge Class ship will be in demand.
